DESCRIPTION: Fish are Colorless #b0 cost cards that confer a bonus effect, draw a card, and #yExhaust.
Effect triggers only if you drew this card during your turn, outside of the opening draw.
Effect triggers only if there are no other cards in your hand.
When you complete a #yQuest, obtain its associated #yReward. NL If you already have that #yQuest in progress, draw #b1 card instead.
In each card reward, #b1 of the cards will be #yFoil. NL #gShiny!
